r.d: This is the Interbase/Firebird MDB2 driver.
r.n: - request #12731: added truncateTable() in the Manager module - request #12732: added vacuum() in the Manager module for OPTIMIZE/VACUUM TABLE abstraction - fixed bug #12924: correctly handle internal expected errors even with custom error handling - fixed bug #12948: removed setCharset(), since "SET NAMES" is only supported in ISQL - fixed bug #12958: support multi autoincrement fields in _makeAutoincrement() [patch by Ali Fazelzade] - fixed listSequences() and listFunctions() in the Manager module with Firebird 2.x - fixed getServerVersion() with Firebird 2.x - feature #12962: in getServerVersion(), fallback to the username/password of the connected user if DBA_username/DBA_password options are not provided [thanks to Ali Fazelzade] - added standaloneQuery() and databaseExists() - added length() function in the Function module (use STRLEN in the std UDF functions)
